org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.harness

Class MultiTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.harness.MultiTest

  • public class MultiTest
extends java.lang.Object
    MultiTest is a multiuser test harness. It runs multiple threads with differing scripts against an embedded server. For syntax see grammar.jj Tests are ended as soon as an unexpected error has occurred or after the specified test duration has transpired. The main loop ends by explicitly quitting (i.e. doing a System.exit()). Deprecated APIs: this test uses AppStreamWriter instead of the preferred AppStreamWriter. This is because utilMain() uses AppStreamWriter (deliberately, i think) so since that is called from this, there you have it.

      • getTestName

        private static java.lang.String getTestName(java.lang.String cmdFile)
        Given the command file, infer the test name. Takes the portion of the file name between the last '.' and the last '/'. e.g. x/y/Name.suffix -> Name
